subject: Basketball
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Rudy Fernandez, a Portland Trail Blazers swingman from Spain, was fined $50,000 by the N.B.A. for comments his European agent, Gerard Darnes, made last week.
snippet: Rudy Fernandez, a Portland Trail Blazers swingman from Spain, was fined $50,000 by the N.B.A. for comments his European agent, Gerard Darnes, made last week.
